meanings.definition: A former name for Oslo, the capital city of Norway.
meanings.sent1: Christiania was the old name for Oslo.
meanings.sent2: People used to call Oslo Christiania in the past.
meanings.sent3: When my grandma was young, she visited Christiania, which is now known as Oslo.
meanings.sent4: The history books mention Christiania as the previous name for Oslo.
meanings.sent5: In the museum, you can see pictures of Christiania, the former Oslo.

meanings.definition: A self-proclaimed autonomous neighborhood in Copenhagen, Denmark.
meanings.sent1: The residents of Christiania have their own rules.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often visit Christiania to experience its unique culture.
meanings.sent3: I heard that in Christiania, even the cats have their own laws!
meanings.sent4: Living in Christiania must feel like being in a small independent country.
meanings.sent5: The colorful houses in Christiania make it stand out from the rest of Copenhagen.
